name: My Talking Bob Cat
description:
Bob is looking for new friends to play with. Have a great time with little Talking Bob Cat. Keep Talking Bob Cat company and shower him with attention and love. Play with lovely Bob Cat and make him the happiest virtual pet.

Features of My Talking Bob Cat

Interact with Talking Bob, pet him, poke him, tickle him to see his reaction.

Say something to Bob and he will repeat it.

Take care of Talking Bob Cat virtual pet prepare him for bed, shower him, take him to the potty.

Play super fun mini-games and win coins.

Meet Bob's adorable pet.

Decorate Bob's house.

Choose an outfit for Bob.

Visit the lab in town and conduct experiments with Bob, go on a boat ride, prank Bob and throw sweets at him, play with the garden hose and dig a hole for Bob's pet.

Spin the wheel of fortune and win amazing prizes.

Download My Talking Bob Cat now and get your personal virtual pet. Adopt Talking Bob Cat and become his owner now!

Download link Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bob.tallking.game&hl=en_US&gl=...

Our site: https://www.gravity-code.com
